name: Prodigal
long_description:
At Prodigal, we have built an AI-native platform delivering end-to-end solutions for collections operations, strategy, and servicing in consumer finance. Our unified suite of applications powered by proprietary advanced AI models, serve every stakeholder within collections teams. 

We are working towards an Agentic vision for consumer finance wherein our AI agents automate critical roles, enhance operations, and drive revenue. 

Headquartered in Mountain View, California, Prodigal's global team combines deep expertise in financial services, AI research, and product innovation, driving efficiency and transformative results across the consumer finance landscape.
